<!-- Spell checker context menu items -->
<!ENTITY spellAddDictionaries.label "Add Dictionaries…">
<!ENTITY spellAddDictionaries.accesskey "A">

Because the two entities below are defined in browser/, we have to redefine them both in messenger.dtd and messengercompose.dtd. Bug 639766 will fix that, so as soon as it's fixed, we should remove those two from our tree, and include the new spell.dtd file instead wherever it's needed (at the time of this writing, and assuming bug 620781 lands), i.e. for the compose window and the main window.
